title: Juniper
description: When my dark magic meets a spelled book, my favorite adult toys turn into…three hotties?!I made an enemy of my allies when I stole a few items that weren't necessarily mine. Now that I'm being hunted, romance isn't in the cards. But after a spell meets my dirty mind, a night of solo fun turns into an evening on the run with:- A shy, bookish vampire- An 18th century pirate with serious swagger- Shakespeare All with the ability to shift back into the er- magical playthings.With only one day until the spell wears off and my men vanish, I promise to show them a good time. There’s only one catch: My enemy is closing in on us. If I want a chance of a future with these naughty toy shifters, I need to confront my painful past.Note: This book contains RH and MM.
author: Eva Delaney
